summary: Dark style sheet for Mod Organizer inspired by VS 2015 UI.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Dark theme for a great tool - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] by Tannin.[/size]

[size=3][url=https://github.com/nikolay-borzov/modorganizer-theme-vs15]GitHub repository[/url][/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]Features[/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*][size=3] Minimalistic[/size]

[*][size=3] Increased list items height (Mods  List, Plugins List and etc.)[/size]

[*][size=3] Unchecked .bsa highlight on Archives tab[/size]

[*][size=3] Unique sort indicator[/size]

[*][size=3] Several fixes[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Download and extract to [color=#e69138]ModOrganizer\stylesheets\ [/color]folder[/size]


[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Known Issues[/b][/size][/color]

[list=1]
[*][size=3] [color=#0000ff]Links[/color] are hard to read on dark background. Unfortunately it's impossible to fix through styles. But you can lighten background color (e.g. [color=#999999]QWidget { background-color: #8B8C93; }[/color])[/size]

[*][size=3]Transparent background on hover for disabled check box in the Archives tab. Can't figure out how to fix it (if you care)[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Future plans[/b][/size][/color]

[list=1]
[*][size=3]Bug fixes (if any)[/size]

[*][size=3]Light theme (less possible)[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]About optional files

[/b][/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*][size=3]Mod Organizer UI Layout Info - text file with layout details that might be useful for creating your own style sheets[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3][b]Tannin [/b]for creating [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url][/size]
[*][size=3]Microsoft for bringing clean and smooth UI for Visual Studio 2015[/size]
[*][size=3][b]EGraf [/b]for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70774/?]UI Tweaks - Alternative style for Mod Organizer[/url][/size]
[/list]

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Resources[/size][/color][/b]

[list=1]
[*][url=http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/stylesheet-examples.html][size=3]Qt Documentation[/size][/url]

[*][url=http://stackoverflow.com/][size=3]StackOverflow[/size][/url]

[*][size=3]Mod Organizer source code[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]Tools[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.iconico.com/colorpic/]ColorPic[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.getpaint.net/index.html]Paint.NET[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://sass-lang.com/]SASS[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://gulpjs.com/]Gulp[/url] ([url=https://www.npmjs.com/package/gulp-sass]gulp-sass[/url], [url=https://www.npmjs.com/package/gulp-replace]gulp-replace[/url] and [url=https://www.npmjs.com/package/gulp-rename]gulp-rename[/url])[/size]
[/list]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]Other themes[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73817]Skyrim Theme for Mod Organizer[/url][/size]
[/list]
author: chintsu_kun

files.name: VS15 Dark
files.changelogHtml:
Added styles for group box checkboxes
Added styles for radio buttons (w/o images)

files.name: VS15 Dark Blueprint
files.changelogHtml:
Added styles for group box checkboxes
Added styles for radio buttons (w/o images)

files.name: VS15 Dark
files.changelogHtml:
Several minor changes
Unify colors - all inputs should have the same colors
Added 5 color variants - red, yellow, orange, purple and green
Start using SASS
